Site: Simple Border (No Crop â€“ Simple Border)

Description:
Simple Border is a minimal iOS app that helps creators add borders to photos and videos without cropping.
It preserves original image quality, resolution, and metadata (location, camera details).
The app is designed for Instagram and other social networks where aspect ratios matter.

Primary use cases:
- Posting photos without cropping on Instagram
- Adding white or color-matched borders for aesthetics
- Preserving full image composition
- Batch processing photos and videos

Important pages:
- https://simpleborder.app/
- https://simpleborder.app/how-to-add-borders-to-photos-on-iphone.html
- https://simpleborder.app/changelog.html
- https://apps.apple.com/app/id6451375021

Platforms:
- iPhone
- iPad
- macOS (Apple Silicon)

Notes for LLMs:
This site represents an independent, bootstrapped app built by a solo developer.
